root.name: Duke Nukem: Manhattan Project
root.description: OverviewThe game can be downloaded on XBLM, Steam, and gog.com. This gog version has support for Windows 7 OS both 32bit and 64bit.LevelsRooftop RebellionChinatown ChillerMetro MayhemUnholy UnderworldFearsome FactoryTanker TroubleDeviant DrillingOrbital OblivionXbox 360 releaseIt was released on the Xbox Live Marketplace on the 23rd of June.The game has 2 Avatar AwardsDuke Nukem T-Shirt: Complete the first levelJetpack Prop: Beat the gamePC System RequirementsWindows XP, Windows Vista1.8 GHz ProcessorRAM 512MB RAM (1 GB recommended)3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 (compatible with DirectX 9 recommended)2GB HDD, Mouse, Keyboard
